title: Help
body: We are unable to log you in because you may be offline tried all the solutions i found went on config and deleted the gameflow-patcher-lock and saved yet still cant login

replies.body: This is likely a connection issue that's struggling to reach the authentication server.  Restart your pc or client just in case something isn't responding in the background, then run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  This will help rule out possibilities as well as tighten up your network to our services.

I tired all of the listed solutions in Connections issues and only the DNS server one i dont know if it helped it just removed the we are unable to log you in cause you may be offline, i can type my id and pass but still wont let me login

Sorry to hear this is still happening.  :(  Submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in this case so our tech team can help out directly and figure out what's going on.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well if possible to obtain some logs, and attach it to your ticket.  We'll reply back as soon as we can.

Yeah i cant access riot games support site for some reason it says

This site can’t be reached

auth.riotgames.com’s server DNS address could not be found.
Try running Windows Network Diagnostics.
DNS_PROBE_FINISHED_NXDOMAIN
Damn, it really seems like something is getting you blocked from reaching our services.  No worries, you can also contact us by email via support@riotgames.com.
